You will face [Shield-Piercing] Barrier and [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions.

You must equip Anti-Barrier and Anti-Unstoppable mods to your arms armor to defeat them. These mods come from the Seasonal Artifact.

tooltipNotifications.displayString: This weapon has active Deepsight Resonance that can be progressed.
This weapon has Resonant Elements available to be extracted. Open the details screen of the weapon to extract.

rewards.flavorText: "My future is concurrently irreversible and unknowable. Before it overtakes me, I desire a more abrupt end to those responsible." —Asher Mir
rewards.displaySource: Random Perks: This item cannot be reacquired from Collections.

rewards.flavorText: "[whistle] With a few more revs, Zahn woulda turned this thing into the fastest bomb you never saw. Good thing for all of us he never got the chance." —Amanda Holliday

grandmasterRewards.flavorText: "My future is concurrently irreversible and unknowable. Before it overtakes me, I desire a more abrupt end to those responsible." —Asher Mir
grandmasterRewards.displaySource: Random Perks: This item cannot be reacquired from Collections.
